product_name: Lonely Planet Guides Yosemite, Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks - 3rd Edition
long_description: The updated edition of Lonely Planet Guides Yosemite, Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks includes detailed information on hiking, family-friendly adventures and ideas for itineraries.
